Title: CJN swears in 57 SANs, calls for integrity, reform in justice system
Summary: Justice Kudirat Kekere-Ekun swore in 57 distinguished legal practitioners as Senior Advocates of Nigeria (SAN) Among those elevated was the Chief Justice of Nigeria .

Title: Mercy Eke marks birthday with new house
Summary: 2019 Big Brother Naija winner, Mercy Eke, has announced the purchase of a new house in Ikoyi, Lagos . Eke unveiled the news on Monday, September 29, 2025, her birthday .

Title: How long should couples wait to have sex after childbirth?
Summary: After nine months of physical and emotional changes, the last thing on many new mothers’ minds is sex . For most women, childbirth leaves their bodies and routines completely transformed . At this point, intimacy often takes a back seat .

Title: ASUU issues 14-day ultimatum to FG over seven-point demands
Summary: Academic Staff Union of Universities issues 14-day ultimatum to address its seven-point demands or face industrial action . Decision was reached at the union’s National Executive Council (NEC) meeting held on Sunday .

Title: Wike endorses APC candidate in Abuja area council polls
Summary: Minister of the FCT, Nyesom Wike, has openly backed APC candidate for the February 2026 Abuja Area Council elections .

Title: New yam festival not fetish – Anyaso
Summary: Chief Chima Anyaso has said that the new yam festival is not fetish, but a celebration of Igbo's rich cultural heritage . Chief said the festival was not fetish but celebration of the rich heritage of the nation .

Title: FG reaffirms commitment to teachers’ welfare
Summary: FG reaffirms commitment to improving welfare, recognition, and professional development of teachers . Nigeria joins global community to commemorate the 2025 World Teachers’ Day .

Title: Super Eagles to face Colombia, Venezuela in November
Summary: The Super Eagles will play two high-profile international friendlies against Venezuela and Colombia in November 2025 . The Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) has confirmed that the two games will take place in November .

Title: Nigeria’s prosperity inseparable from future of northern Nigeria – Tinubu
Summary: President Bola Tinubu declared that Nigeria’s prosperity is inseparable from the future of Northern Nigeria . Tinuba declared that the country's future is inextricable from future of northern Nigeria .

Title: Redevelopment Plans: Amuwo Odofin LG set to relocate Agboju market temporarily
Summary: The Amuwo Odofin Local Government has announced plans to relocate traders at Agboju Market to a temporary settlement . The move is part of redevelopment efforts in the area .
